public.app-category.lifestyle
Copyright Â© 2025 Aura One. All rights reserved.
Aura One needs your location to add context to your journal entries and track the places you visit.
Aura One can track your daily journey in the background to automatically map your day and add location context to your memories.
Aura One needs access to your photo library to discover photos and videos from your day to enrich your journal entries.
Aura One needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
Aura One needs access to your calendar to import events and add context to your journal entries.
Aura One needs full calendar access to read and create events, helping you track your schedule and activities.
Aura One can read your health data to provide insights about your physical activity and well-being in your journal.
Aura One can save mindfulness and mental health data to Health app to track your well-being journey.
Aura One uses Bluetooth to detect nearby devices and locations to add context to your journal entries.
Aura One uses Bluetooth to connect with wearable devices for health tracking.
Aura One needs camera access to capture photos for your journal entries and memories.
Aura One needs microphone access for voice notes and voice-to-text features in your journal.
Aura One uses motion data to track your physical activities and add context to your daily summaries.
